name: @eruditorgroup/profi-icons
description: Common icon set for Eruditor Group
author: profiru

scripts.clean: rimraf lib && rimraf dist && rimraf test/visual/dist
scripts.build: yarn clean && yarn build:cjs && yarn webpack build && yarn build:esm
scripts.build:cjs: yarn compile:typescript --outDir dist/cjs && MODULE_TYPE=cjs yarn compile:babel -d dist/cjs
scripts.build:esm: yarn compile:typescript --outDir dist/esm && MODULE_TYPE=esm yarn compile:babel -d dist/esm
scripts.compile:flow: for i in $(find dist -type f -name "*.d.ts"); do sh -c "flowgen $i -o ${i%.*.*}.js.flow --add-flow-header;echo 'Done $i';"; done;
